definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
distinct/clear/orderly/pain/suffering/deciduous bush used in Chinese medicine (genus Vitex)/punishment cane (old)
surname Chu/abbr. for Hubei 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] and Hunan 湖南省[Hu2 nan2 Sheng3] provinces together/Chinese kingdom during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (722-221 BC)

sentences.english: She felt an unheard-of joy, and a profound anguish.
sentences.chinese: 她感到一種從未有過的快樂和一種深切的酸楚。

sentences.english: His language of hatred and the way it was delivered left a sour taste.
sentences.chinese: 忿然的言語中帶着酸楚的味道。

sentences.english: Han Bing looked at the computer on the baby pictures, the hearts of sorrow and grief.
sentences.chinese: 韓冰看着電腦上的嬰兒圖片，心中酸楚。

sentences.english: The sorrow and grief is unspeakable.
sentences.chinese: 這份酸楚是無法言表的。

sentences.english: In the vinegar and lemon juice of life.
sentences.chinese: 在醋和檸檬汁一樣酸楚的生活中。

sentences.english: Today, the pain and grievances like again.
sentences.chinese: 今天，那種酸楚與委屈好像又在重演。

sentences.english: Grievance , of psychology distressed, who can be recounted.
sentences.chinese: 委屈，心理的酸楚，有誰可以訴說。

sentences.english: In fact iron young tiger also understand the change of attitude with clouds, in the heart can not help a pang of emotion.
sentences.chinese: 其實鐵彪也明瞭繡雲心態的改變，心中不禁一陣酸楚。

sentences.english: Ziyun, at that time, felt warmer than ever, even to an extent of sadness.
sentences.chinese: 紫雲的心情此時感到無比的溫暖，甚至有一點酸楚。

sentences.english: Trivial every single word or phrase is a pain in the spread, sour boiling, herself.
sentences.chinese: 瑣碎的一字一句都是痛在蔓延，酸楚沸騰，身心俱焚。

definition: all sorts of feelings well up in one's heart
